name: Area 51: The Game
description:
Quick Notice!

This game currently has no game play to it, so I advise you to not have high expectation *for now*.

We do have big plans for this game.

If you have any problems, leave it down in the comments.

This page is a WIP.

Area 51: The Game

Area 51: The Game is a game about the strictly classified government facility, Area 51. A lot of the things in the community (from the roleplay discord server) was inspired by the SCP Foundation wiki.

In the game you're either placed as facility personnel, a AAR agent, a AIS (Alien/Anomaly in Study), or someone apart of the Desert Antos.

If you need anymore information (about groups, etc.), use this google document or the information provided in the discord server.

Controls Left ClickClick

Yep that's it, *for now*.

Helpers and Developers

The people who make this game are a growing group of people from a discord role play server called "Area 51 (Remastered..)". The server was inspired by the SCP Foundation wiki as well as this game.

  • Mstrrer (Me) - This is me, I thought of the project because the owners of the discord server we come from wanted to make a role play game on ROBLOX, and I thought it was too restricted and really hard to script (since ROBLOX is really bad at fixing scripting things), so I thought of creating a project in Unity.
  • Detective Ash / HorribleSmoothie - This is the first person I have shown the idea of this project to, she wished to help me, and I accepted. She is the project Co-Founder.
  • Kurt - The first person who manned up and asked me to become part of the project when we announced that we were making this project reality. He is a sprite creator, a play tester, and a moderator.
Tools used (so far):
  • Unity and Unity Documentation + a dash of youtube help;
  • Asperite and paint.net;
  • Discord (for communication);
  • Notepad++; and
  • Inspiration (this was key).
